cells.data:
-- filter :: (a -> Bool) -> [a] -> [a]
on filter(f, xs)
    tell mReturn(f)
        set lst to {}
        set lng to length of xs
        repeat with i from 1 to lng
            set v to item i of xs
            if |Î»|(v, i, xs) then set end of lst to v
        end repeat
        return lst
    end tell
end filter
